data.description: Cute and quaint home on great lot in Mount Holly for the minimalist buyer or possibly a rental for investors or could easily be a starter home. This 1 bed 1 bath home is located on a very good sized lot that is fully fenced in with newly planted fruit trees, plenty of parking for any toys, fire pit to enjoy the evenings and more. There are sheds for plenty of storage also. Close proximity to downtown Mount Holly and all it has to offer. Inside is a cozy living room to enjoy coffee, read that great novel or watch your favorite movie.  Kitchen features a small breakfast bar. Refrigeratior stays. Bathroom has a cute claw foot style tub/shower. Nice sized bedroom has large closet. Not many like this one. Country living close to the city. No HOA. Come and make it yours.
